website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few changes, Tickle Me Elmo is still a classic toy that is as entertaining to today's youngsters as he was as a bestseller in the 1990s.
pros: The beloved plush toy that giggles, shakes, and talks
Laughs harder and louder as kids squeeze and tickle
Some parents say it's comforting and entertaining for their kids
Designed for ages 18 months to 4 years
cons: A few consumers who remember the toy from decades ago gripe that the updated version isn't as soft and plush as the first generation Tickle Me Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - fur everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Beware - Elmo’s fur falls out all over the place. I got this for my 6 month old, which it’s intended for. However, it’s so cheaply made, the fur pulls out so easily. Like most babies, mine likes to put everything in his mouth. Today, I saw red Elmo fur in his poop. So please, beware,
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hocker

customer_reviews.title: This Elmo’s is nice and small for our 2 year old twins
customer_reviews.text: This Elmo’s is nice and small for our 2 year old twins. He’s very soft and cuddly and we love that he has an off and on button. Perfect birthday or Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. I wish I hadn’t purchased. It was a “Santa” gift for my 2 year old and it didn’t even work on Christmas morning. So disappointing for my husband and I and especially our little boy. Maybe if I had bought it in the store? I don’t know. I did everything the directions said to “fix it” if something were wrong & nothing. It literally just vibrates continuously & doesn’t make any noise. We just have to keep it off.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Not soft, too hard of a body for a child
customer_reviews.text: Actually quite disappointed. No real stuffing around the body, which houses the hard-plastic voicebox and battery. This means it is not only *not* in any way like a stuffed animal (which, I could’ve sworn the original was), but it could also be dangerous to a sibling, parent, pet, or tv if the child is young and swings it around or throws it. Be cautious, maybe check it out in a toy store or Walmart/Target first.
customer_reviews.author: LSimon

customer_reviews.title: NOT the Elmo that moves around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew thinking it was the tickle me Elmo that used to move its arms and move around the floor when you pressed the button for it to laugh. It wasn’t that. There’s just a button on his belly and he lightly vibrates when he laughs and talks. My nephew still liked it so it’s okay. Not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am 68 and I bought this little guy for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 and I bought this little guy for myself. Can't help giggling along when his sound is activated puts a smile on your face. Sooooooooo cute.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: First off if u order pay attention to the packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: First off if u order pay attention to the packaging options.. the people complaining about it coming in just a box ordered it that way! It clearly states that In the options.. for me the box is easier to wrap and my kid doesn't care what packaging it comes in and he loves this thing everytime we see it at Wal-Mart .. can't wait for xmas morning
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the 90’s version
customer_reviews.text: Cute laugh, but not as big or soft as the old one from back in the day. The tummy is hard and laugh box is big, so definitely not for cuddling. Overall it’s cute but since I had the old one when I was young, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So maybe not a good gift for a 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: First off, it’s really small. You have to press his belly really hard to get him to laugh. I’m giving this 1 star because my little one can’t get him to laugh without my assistance. You can’t make him laugh by pressing on his hands or feet. So maybe not a good gift for a 1 year old. I wouldn’t pay more than $10 for this.
customer_reviews.author: Chenelle

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Received this late, and defective. Won't turn on at all, even after I replaced the batteries. Definitely not ok as this was supposed to be a Christmas present. Not even dealing with sending it back, so I can't speak for the customer service, but the item sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Really likes Tickle Me Elmo!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler really likes Tickle me Elmo. So this is the perfect toy for her. It would be even better, if it had several phrases. The off button doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: A sweet and fun Elmo toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adorable plush toy for my grandson and he is so delighted with it! I was surprized that Tickle Me Elmo is still being manufactured since it was very popular years ago. Elmo is well made and his mechanism plays laughing sounds and a few phrases. Thank you Amazon because my local retail stores do not carry this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Miccio

customer_reviews.title: very loose fabric
customer_reviews.text: my girls like this for about 5 minutes. When i purchased it i didnt realize it was a more plush version of the tickle me elmo & not the one that rolls on the ground. It is also hard for my kids to hit the right spot on the belly to make it laugh, the fabric moves a lot so their hands slip.
customer_reviews.author: trevor james

customer_reviews.title: A little hard in the centre
customer_reviews.text: Elmo's centre is not padded. And the fluff falls off with gentle pulling. But otherwise a good buy. My toddler loves him. Sturdy enough so far. Has withstood the throwing
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Shedding problem
customer_reviews.text: Elmo has a serious shedding problem. If he keeps shedding the way he is he’ll be bald within the week. It’s also hard to get his stomach to do anything. You have to push really hard and in a very specific area. My son loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work! Major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: My first review in the 8+ years of Amazon purchases, but I felt it necessary. Item was gift for toddler granddaughter obsessed with Elmo. Item did not work at all, so basically only HARD stuffed toy. No option available from Amazon to replace it since it was purchased on sale I gather. I either return for refund and pay original price for another one, or send back for refund. Lose, lose... all the way around. Decided to keep the defective one so she won't go without, until I can get her another one somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: MariaT

customer_reviews.title: Elmo obsessed toddler loves this
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is currently obsessed with all things Elmo. He loves this toy and giggles when he hears Elmo laugh and/or talk. FYI- Elmo vibrates when activated. The only issue I have is that there isn’t much padding or fluff. The voice box is pretty hard and can be felt easily through Elmo’s tummy. Overall, it was a good buy for my Elmo obsessed little one.
customer_reviews.author: CNguyen

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for everyone
customer_reviews.text: it's weird but this little fella puts a smile on the face of the two year old granddaughter and her grandparents. The perfect gift for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: molinL

customer_reviews.title: TOO CUTE!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ADORABLE!! Bought this for our 2 yr old grandson as part of his xmas gifts he will love it. Brings back memories of our sons when they were little. Cute little guy!
customer_reviews.author: linda gorman

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful toy and it comes with batteries. I just wish the tickle spots were easier for a child to find and I wish Elmo laughed longer once you pushed them.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy for my Elmo obsessed 1 1/2 y/o daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy for my Elmo obsessed 1 1/2 y/o daughter. Tickle me Elmo is soft enough for her to hug/cuddle with. Push his tummy or squeeze guys foot and he talks/giggles/shakes with laughter. She is unable to make him do this on her own so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. It's brand new
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my niece. It didn't come in a box but a plastic bag with a set of instructions. Came with batteries. Works just fine. It's brand new.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holderby

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wouldn’t recommend as a gift because it looks used there’s no ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this but it came in a brown box. Definitely wouldn’t recommend as a gift because it looks used there’s no Elmo packaging. They should have said it would come in a brown box before I ordered it.. especially for 25 bucks!

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: She is obsessed with Elmo and was given this as a gift. It's her favorite toy. She has to have it next to her when it's bedtime.

customer_reviews.title: Needs an off switch
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old LOVES this toy...mommy wishes it had an off switch; which it doesn’t...which is why it only got 4 stars. It’s unnerving hearing Elmo laugh in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great tickle me a Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my grandson and he is afraid of it. Maybe when he gets a little older, he will enjoy it.

customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that all this doll does is giggle. Much prefer the Elmo that talks... this is kind of dumb!

customer_reviews.title: It only has like 2 sayings
customer_reviews.text: It only has like 2 sayings, and laughs for a short period, so not long enough to keep a 22 month old entertained, especially if they are unable to push Elmo's tummy in just the right way with just the right amount of force. Also, it did not come in a nice box, making it awkward to gift to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Same as More Expensive Option
customer_reviews.text: I compared this to the more expensive option, and there was no difference in size, quality, or performance.
customer_reviews.author: Patrcia

customer_reviews.title: Laughter is the best medicine
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I couldn't tell you anything about this product. I purchased it because you can't go wrong with anything laughing; it's the best medicine and very contagious.
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy with the cardboard "frustration free" packaging

customer_reviews.title: If you can go to store, buy it there
customer_reviews.text: Had I realized that it wouldn’t have come with batteries, I would’ve bought it at the store and saved me money from having to buy batteries for it

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality- skinny, unstuffed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing quality. This is unlike the first Tickle me Elmo introduced 20 years ago that was soft and cuddly and giggled and laughed. This version is a low quality red polyester sack with virtually no stuffing so you feel the electronics like a brick in a red poly bag. Sure it giggles but not what a child could have fun snuggling with. A cheaply made, poor version of what used to be a very cute toy. It also arrives in a plastic bag inside a brown corrugated box so it would look as if you got it at a local resale shop rather than new if you plan to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Marinnes

product_meta.title: Playskool Friends Sesame Street Tickle Me Elmo
product_meta.description: HA! HA! Hee! Hee! Elmo’s hysterical laugh is back! The magic of Tickle Me Elmo returns--redesigned for a whole new generation of fans! Little ones can start the hilarious fun when they press his tummy or squeeze his feet. First they’ll hear Elmo’s contagious giggle. When they continue to squeeze and “tickle” Elmo, he laughs harder and harder until he starts to move and shake! Children can’t help but giggle along when they hear his funny sayings and hysterical laughing sounds. Tickle Me Elmo is as silly, cuddly, and lovable as ever! He’s funny! He’s furry! You can’t put this giggle monster down! 2 AA demo batteries included. Sesame Street and associated characters, trademarks and design elements are owned and licensed by Sesame Workshop. Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: This version comes in simple brown packaging
One of the most sought-after toys of the ‘90s, redesigned for today’s generation
Press Elmo’s tummy or squeeze his foot to hear his contagious laugh
Tickle him more and he laughs harder and shakes
Says funny phrases and makes different laughing sounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars510 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
